short_summary: Frequentation study of the Battlefields Park.
description: The National Battlefields Commission wants to carry out a frequentation study of the Battlefields Park.",
full_summary:
Title of Tender Announcement | Étude de la fréquentation du Parc des Champs-de-Bataille
================================ ==
National Battlefields Commission | Commission de champs de bataille nationaux

Tender Details | Informations d'Appel d'Offres
-------------------

* Reference Number | numéro de référence: cb-906-61506809
* Amendment Number | numéro de modification: 4
* Solicitation Number | numéro de sollicitation: CCBN-24-1352
* Publication Date | date de publication: 2024-03-01
* Tender Closing Date | date de clôture des propositions: 2024-04-02T11:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date | date prévue de début de contrat: 2024-05-01
* Expected Contract End Date | date prévue de fin de contrat: 2024-11-30

Tender Notice | Avis d'Appel d'Offres
----------------------

The National Battlefields Commission invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the purchase of studies for the frequency analysis of the Battlefields Park. 

The Commission is seeking a supplier to conduct a study to determine the frequency of visitors to the Battlefields Park. The study should be completed by November 30, 2024.

Scope of Work | Champ d'Application
------------------

* Conduct a study to determine the frequency of visitors to the Battlefields Park
* Deliver the study by November 30, 2024
* Provide recommendations for improvement to the park facilities

Admissible Proposals | Propositions Admissibles

Only proposals from suppliers who have a good understanding of how to conduct a frequency study of a park will be considered. Proposals should be submitted in one of Canada's two official languages. Proposals sent by fax or email will not be accepted.

Tender Evaluation Criteria | Criteres d'évaluation de la proposition

Proposals will be evaluated on the basis of technical merit (40%) and price (60%). Suppliers are expected to provide a comprehensive proposal that outlines their approach, methodology, and technical expertise.

Contracting Authority | Autorité contractante

The Contracting Authority is the National Battlefields Commission. Contact Philippe Lafrenière:

Email: philippe.lafreniere@ccbn-nbc.gc.ca
Phone: 418-948-2260
Address: 835, av. Wilfrid-Laurier, Québec, QC G1R 2
